div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 720 Skrevatno, Blagoevgrad district, Bul- garia, 1962 Burial: c. 350 B.C. (T) Contents: 197+ AR. Pot hoard Thasos: 3 st.; 194 trihemiob. Disposition: Blagoevgrad 3 st. and 187 fr.; private coll., Goce Delƒçev, 7 fr. Gerasimov, BIAB 27 (1964), p. 240
